testCases.label: Verify returnBoolean returns true for true input
Verify returnBoolean returns false for false input
Verify returnAnd true && true returns true
testCases.description: Checks that returnAnd(true, true) returns true.

testCases.label: Verify returnAnd false && true returns false
testCases.description: Checks that returnAnd(false, true) returns false.

testCases.label: Verify returnAnd false && false returns false
testCases.description: Checks that returnAnd(false, false) returns false.

testCases.label: Verify returnAnd false && true returns false (duplicate case)
testCases.description: Checks that returnAnd(false, true) returns false.

testCases.label: Verify returnOr true || true returns true
testCases.description: Checks that returnOr(true, true) returns true.

testCases.label: Verify returnOr true || false returns true
testCases.description: Checks that returnOr(true, false) returns true.

testCases.label: Verify returnOr false || true returns true
testCases.description: Checks that returnOr(false, true) returns true.

testCases.label: Verify returnOr false || false returns false
testCases.description: Checks that returnOr(false, false) returns false.
